channel.title: Errors in client.java

item.title: Errors in client.java
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

Inside a string, you need to escape all quotation marks.
Try this: PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Owner & Coder \";Boomer;\" has logged in";

Read full topic

item.title: Errors in client.java
item.dc:creator: @airborne airborne
item.description:
@airborne wrote:

I can’t download your file. Do this; compile, when the errors are done showing and it says press any key, right click, click select all, and press enter
Then paste your error in code tags: [ code ] [ /code ] No spaces[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 15, 2009, 06:44:12 am[/size][hr]Put it in code tags so I can read.

Read full topic

item.title: Errors in client.java
item.dc:creator: @boomer6 boomer6
item.description:
@boomer6 wrote:

Hi guys i have 10 errors with my client.java in my source it keeps saying not a statement help?
client.java:10462: not a statement
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Owner & Coder “;Boomer;” has logged in”;
^

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Owner & Coder “;Boomer;” has logged in”;
^

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Co-owner “ o;r t;s;” has logged in”;
^

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Co-owner “ o;r t;s;” has logged in”;
^
client.java:10470: not a statement
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Owner & Coder “;Boomer;” has logged in”;
^

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Owner & Coder “;Boomer;” has logged in”;
^
client.java:10474: not a statement
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Server Administrator “;Open;” has logged in”;
^

^
